introduction: Claim your State Pension online when you're within 4 months of your State Pension age.
more_information:
- you need to use a different form for [claims in Northern Ireland.](http://www.nidirect.gov.uk/state-pension-online "Claim your State Pension online"){:rel="external"}
- you can only claim for yourself 
- you can save the form at any time and return to it later 
- if you used the [Pension Forecast service](https://secure.thepensionservice.gov.uk/statepensionforecast/ "State Pension forecast"){:rel="external"} before you already have Government Gateway login 
- if you want to [defer your State Pension](/deferring-state-pension "Deferring your State Pension") you can't claim  

##What you need when you make a claim

You'll need to give the following:

- your and your spouse's or civil partner's National Insurance number
- your current and 2 previous addresses 
- your tax reference number - you can find this on your P45, P60 or any letter from HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC)
- employment details if you've worked in the past 2 years - addresses and dates 
- dates and social security numbers if you’ve lived or worked abroad
- the date of your marriage or civil partnership 
- dates if you’re divorced or your civil partnership has been dissolved 
- the date if your spouse or civil partner has died
- details of any benefits that you, your spouse or civil partner get 
- the number for the account you want your State Pension paid into 

All the information you give will be treated confidentially.


*[NI]: National Insurance
*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs
overview: Claim online to get your State Pension paid directly into your bank account when you're within 4 months of your State Pension age
title: Claim your State Pension online
